mean_cn: n. 工作环境改造学，人类工程学
mean_en: the study of working conditions, especially the design of equipment and furniture, in order to help people work more efficiently.
sentence: With the help of ergonomics, we can design our office facilities to be more comfortable.
sentence_trans: 在工作环境改造学的帮助下，我们能设计出让我们更舒服的办公设施。
